Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Inverness (Loch Ness), The Craigdarroch Inn is within the vicinity of Urquhart Castle and Loch Ness 2000 Exhibition Centre. This 4-star inn is within the region of Original Loch Ness Monster Visitor Centre and Benedictine Abbey.

Rooms
Stay in one of 8 guestrooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Craigdarroch Inn. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Craigdarroch Inn. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Inverness (Loch Ness), The Craigdarroch Inn is within the vicinity of Urquhart Castle and Loch Ness 2000 Exhibition Centre. This 4-star inn is within the region of Original Loch Ness Monster Visitor Centre and Benedictine Abbey.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Urquhart Castle - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Loch Ness 2000 Exhibition Centre - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Original Loch Ness Monster Visitor Centre - 9.5 km / 5.9 mi
Benedictine Abbey - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi
Moniack Castle - 23.9 km / 14.9 mi
Beauly Priory - 25.9 km / 16.1 mi
Glen Ord Distillery - 28.3 km / 17.6 mi
Bellfield Park - 28.8 km / 17.9 mi
Muir of Ord Golf Club - 29.1 km / 18.1 mi
Eden Court Theatre - 29.1 km / 18.1 mi
Inverness Cathedral - 29.3 km / 18.2 mi
Inverness Castle - 29.6 km / 18.4 mi
Inverness Museum and Art Gallery - 29.6 km / 18.4 mi
Glen Affric - 29.6 km / 18.4 mi
Eastgate Shopping Centre - 30.1 km / 18.7 mi

The preferred airport for The Craigdarroch Inn is Inverness (INV) - 41.1 km / 25.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
